indicators.name: Composite leading indicators
indicators.description: Leading Indicator for Cyclical Fluctuations published by OECD.

indicators.name: Composite Coincident Index
indicators.description: Composite Coincident Index published by Statistics Korea.

indicators.name: Composite Leading Index
indicators.description: Leading Indicator for Cyclical Fluctuations published by Statistics Korea.

indicators.name: Composite Leading Index
indicators.description: Composite Leading Index published by Statistics Korea, providing signals for the leading direction of the economy.

indicators.name: Korea Composite Stock Price Index
indicators.description: Representative index of the Korean stock market, indicating the overall movement of the stock market.

indicators.name: CPI Change (YoY)
indicators.description: Indicator comparing the Consumer Price Index of the current month with that of the same month in the previous year, representing the annual inflation rate of consumer prices.

indicators.name: KOSPI Market Cap
indicators.description: Indicator representing the total market capitalization of companies listed on the Korean stock market.

indicators.name: GDP growth rate (real, seasonally adjusted, QoQ)
indicators.description: Seasonally adjusted quarterly growth rate of real GDP.

indicators.name: GDP growth rate (real, YoY)
indicators.description: Year-on-year growth rate of real GDP in nominal terms.

indicators.name: Increase rate of GDP deflator
indicators.description: Increase rate of GDP deflator based on the year-on-year change in the GDP deflator.

indicators.name: Gross domestic product (current prices, won)
indicators.description: Nominal value of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) expressed in Korean Won.

indicators.name: Gross domestic product (current prices, dollar)
indicators.description: Nominal value of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) expressed in US dollars.

indicators.name: GDP growth rate
indicators.description: Indicator representing the real growth rate of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) in the domestic economy.

indicators.name: GDP growth rate
indicators.description: Indicator representing the real growth rate of Gross Domestic Product (GDP) in the domestic economy.

indicators.name: GDP growth rate (real, seasonally adjusted, QoQ)
indicators.description: Seasonally adjusted quarterly growth rate of real GDP.

indicators.name: GDP Deflator
indicators.description: GDP deflator based on the year 2015 as the reference year.

indicators.name: Increase rate of GDP deflator
indicators.description: Increase rate of the GDP deflator expressed as a percentage change.

indicators.name: Increase rate of GDP deflator (YoY)
indicators.description: Increase rate of GDP deflator based on the year-on-year change in the GDP deflator.

indicators.name: Gross domestic product at market prices (seasonally adjusted, nominal)
indicators.description: Gross domestic product (GDP) at market prices, adjusted for seasonality and unspecified factors, in nominal terms.

indicators.name: Gross domestic product at market prices (seasonally adjusted, real)
indicators.description: Gross domestic product (GDP) at market prices, adjusted for seasonality, in real terms.

indicators.name: Govt. Bonds 1Y Rate
indicators.description: Daily yield of government bonds with a maturity of 1 year.

indicators.name: Govt. Bonds 3Y Rate
indicators.description: Daily yield of government bonds with a maturity of 3 years.

indicators.name: Govt. Bonds 10Y Rate
indicators.description: Daily yield of government bonds with a maturity of 10 years.

indicators.name: Corp. Bonds 3Y Rate (AA-)
indicators.description: Monthly yield of AA- rated corporate bonds with a maturity of 3 years.

indicators.name: BOK Policy Rate
indicators.description: Benchmark interest rate set by the Bank of Korea.
